title: Day of Requests Results
body:
Well, the voting is now closed with more than 50000 votes casted in less than 24 hours. Great result, girls and boys!

Based on results, I will make repacks for these 10 games. First 7 go by default, and I’ve added three more places, with Battlefield 4 as a total bonus, which didn’t make to a voting by a small margin. But you know, by a power given to me by YOU KNOW WHO I can cancel Brexit repack any game I want!

6295The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (Update)
2953Dead or Alive 5: Last Round
2787Age of Empires 3: Gold Edition
2769Kingdoms of Amalur
2724Final Fantasy XIII
2509Sleeping Dogs
2218Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions
2092Fallout 4 (Update)
2055The Sims 3
BonusBattlefield 4

The order of repacks is not defined, they will be produced with a lower priority compared to fresh repacks. So don’t expect any ETA on them. Just wait.
